entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind east 20 km/h. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water this evening. Wind becoming light before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms and hail in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
